title: October 04, 2024 — Suggested Questions for Cortex Analyst — Preview | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: We are pleased to announce the preview of Suggested Questions for Cortex Analyst.

The Suggested Questions feature in Cortex Analyst provides relevant suggestions for questions your users can ask while
interacting with your Cortex Analyst-powered conversational app. Use this feature to help your users get started.
For more details, see Suggested Questions in Cortex Analyst.
